    • Constructor Detail

      • ShapeItems

        public ShapeItems​(java.lang.String name,
                  java.awt.Shape shape,
                  java.awt.Color color)
        First Constructor of Class ShapeItems to create instances containing Lines, Rectangles and Polygons
        Parameters:
        name - stores name of the objects (Lines, Rectangles and Polygons)
        shape - stores geometry/shape of the objects (Lines, Rectangles and Polygons)
        color - stores color of objects (Lines, Rectangles and Polygons)

      • ShapeItems

        public ShapeItems​(java.lang.String name,
                  java.awt.Point point,
                  java.awt.Color color)
        Second Constructor of Class ShapeItems to create instances containing Points only
        Parameters:
        name - stores name of the Point objects
        point - stores geometry/shape of the Point objects
        color - stores color of Point objects
